page.title: 15 Life Styles
page.content: Information supplied on questionaires. 420 were sent to families in the Buckley and Mynydd Isa Areas in the 4 x 3 block.348 were returned, representing 83%. 40% live in detached housing, 44% in semi-detached housing,15% in bungalows ,1% in terraced housing.(Average no. of children per family is 2.15) 100% own a TV, 100% own a washing machine,91% own a stereo or music centre,90% have central heating,65% own a sewing machine,46% own a micro computer,11% own a knitting machine,11% own a dishwasher. 7% of the families own no car,62% own one car,29% own 2 cars and 2% own three or more cars.
